scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,WEB -c auto "pnpm -C apps/api start:dev" "pnpm -C apps/web dev"
scripts.pm2:build: pnpm -C apps/api build && pnpm -C apps/web build
scripts.pm2:start: pnpm run pm2:build && pnpm exec pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --update-env
scripts.pm2:stop: pnpm exec pm2 stop finance-api finance-web
scripts.pm2:delete: pnpm exec pm2 delete finance-api finance-web
